thread.title: BRIEF-China Development Bank International Investment Expects Significant Improvement In Profit​ For FY

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Development Bank International Investment Expects Significant Improvement In Profit​ For FY

organizations.name: china development bank international investment ltd

text:
March 2 (Reuters) - China Development Bank International Investment Ltd:
* EXPECTS ‍ A SIGNIFICANT IMPROVEMENT IN GROUP’S PROFIT​ FOR FY
* CHINA DEVELOPMENT BANK INTERNATIONAL INVESTMENT-EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO ‍ CHANGE IN FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL ASSETS AT FAIR VALUE THROUGH PROFIT OR LOSS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
